text: Douglas Leslie Dewey Bell, (born June 15, 1926) is a Canadian politician and former Commissioner of the Yukon.Canadian who's who He was made a Member of the Order of Canada in 1989 and a member of the Order of Yukon in 2019.https://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/north/order-of-yukon- recipients-2019-1.5379422https://www.whitehorsestar.com/News/commissioner- names-first-recipients-of-the-order-of-yukon ==References== * History of Yukon Commissioners Category:Living people Category:Commissioners of Yukon Category:Members of the Order of Canada Category:1926 births
title: Douglas Bell (politician)
